typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{DateDébutValidité} as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix DO} as string,
		{Prix pro} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Offre nationale} as string,
		{Année Tarif} as string,
		PotentielP1N as string,
		PotentielP2N as string,
		PotentielP3N as string,
		PotentielP4N as string,
		PotentielP5N as string,
		PotentielP6N as string,
		{DateFinValidité} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		{Date de création} as string,
		NomSignataire1 as string,
		NomSignataire2 as string,
		DateSignataire1 as string,
		DateSignataire2 as string,
		{DateDérogation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> offreDiffusInput
source(output(
		{DateDébutValidité} as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix DO} as string,
		{Prix pro} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Offre nationale} as string,
		{Année Tarif} as string,
		PotentielP1N as string,
		PotentielP2N as string,
		PotentielP3N as string,
		PotentielP4N as string,
		PotentielP5N as string,
		PotentielP6N as string,
		{DateFinValidité} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		{Date de création} as string,
		NomSignataire1 as string,
		NomSignataire2 as string,
		DateSignataire1 as string,
		DateSignataire2 as string,
		{DateDérogation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> offreChantierInput
Filter1 derive(Canal = "Diffus",
		{Référence} = iif(substring({Référence},1,2) == "00", substring({Référence},3,length({Référence})-2), {Référence})) ~> canalDiffus
canalDiffus select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre = {DateDébutValidité},
		{Date Prev Cde},
		{Code projet},
		Projet,
		Type,
		{CP projet},
		{Ville projet},
		NbLogement,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		Famille,
		Produit,
		{Quantité},
		{Prix de base},
		{Prix DO},
		{Prix pro},
		{Prix total},
		{Numéro interne 1},
		Client,
		{Ville client},
		{Type financement},
		{Numéro interne 2},
		{Négoce},
		{Ville négoce},
		{Statut offre},
		Responsable,
		Groupe,
		Offre,
		{Date de maj statut},
		{Numéro avant vente},
		{Créateur offre},
		{Commentaire interne},
		{Offre dérogée},
		{Contrat cadre},
		{Offre nationale},
		{Année Tarif},
		PotentielP1N,
		PotentielP2N,
		PotentielP3N,
		PotentielP4N,
		PotentielP5N,
		PotentielP6N,
		{DateFinValidité},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		CodeATC,
		DEEE,
		OffreSupprimee,
		{Date de création},
		NomSignataire1,
		NomSignataire2,
		DateSignataire1,
		DateSignataire2,
		{DateDérogation},
		Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnsChoiceDiffus
columnsChoiceDiffus derive({Quantité} = toDouble({Quantité}),
		DateOffre = toDate(DateOffre,"yyyy-mm-dd")) ~> typeCast
Filter2 derive(Canal = "Chantier",
		{Référence} = iif(substring({Référence},1,2) == "00", substring({Référence},3,length({Référence})-2), {Référence})) ~> canalChantier
canalChantier select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre = {DateDébutValidité},
		{Date Prev Cde},
		{Code projet},
		Projet,
		Type,
		{CP projet},
		{Ville projet},
		NbLogement,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		Famille,
		Produit,
		{Quantité},
		{Prix de base},
		{Prix DO},
		{Prix pro},
		{Prix total},
		{Numéro interne 1},
		Client,
		{Ville client},
		{Type financement},
		{Numéro interne 2},
		{Négoce},
		{Ville négoce},
		{Statut offre},
		Responsable,
		Groupe,
		Offre,
		{Date de maj statut},
		{Numéro avant vente},
		{Créateur offre},
		{Commentaire interne},
		{Offre dérogée},
		{Contrat cadre},
		{Offre nationale},
		{Année Tarif},
		PotentielP1N,
		PotentielP2N,
		PotentielP3N,
		PotentielP4N,
		PotentielP5N,
		PotentielP6N,
		{DateFinValidité},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		CodeATC,
		DEEE,
		OffreSupprimee,
		{Date de création},
		NomSignataire1,
		NomSignataire2,
		DateSignataire1,
		DateSignataire2,
		{DateDérogation},
		Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnsChoiceChantier
columnsChoiceChantier derive(DateOffre = toDate(DateOffre,"yyyy-mm-dd"),
		NbLogement = toDouble(NbLogement),
		{Quantité} = toDouble({Quantité}),
		{Numéro interne 2} = toDouble({Numéro interne 2})) ~> typeCastChantier
typeCastChantier derive(Produit = replace(Produit, '"', "")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(Produit = replace(Produit, "'", " ")) ~> cleanProduit
offreDiffusInput filter(!isNull(Offre)) ~> Filter1
offreChantierInput filter(!isNull(Offre)) ~> Filter2
offreChantierInput filter(Offre=="ZADX6708") ~> Filter3
Filter3 derive({Référence} = iif(substring({Référence},1,2) == "00", substring({Référence},3,length({Référence})-2), {Référence})) ~> DerivedColumn3
cleanProduit select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Date Prev Cde},
		{Code projet},
		Projet,
		Type,
		{CP projet},
		{Ville projet},
		NbLogement,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		Famille,
		Produit,
		{Quantité},
		{Prix de base},
		{Prix DO},
		{Prix pro},
		{Prix total},
		{Numéro interne 1},
		Client,
		{Ville client},
		{Type financement},
		{Numéro interne 2},
		{Négoce},
		{Ville négoce},
		{Statut offre},
		Responsable,
		Groupe,
		Offre,
		{Date de maj statut},
		{Numéro avant vente},
		{Créateur offre},
		{Commentaire interne},
		{Offre dérogée},
		{Contrat cadre},
		{Offre nationale},
		{Année Tarif},
		PotentielP1N,
		PotentielP2N,
		PotentielP3N,
		PotentielP4N,
		PotentielP5N,
		PotentielP6N,
		{DateFinValidité},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		CodeATC,
		DEEE,
		OffreSupprimee,
		{Date de création},
		NomSignataire1,
		NomSignataire2,
		DateSignataire1,
		DateSignataire2,
		{DateDérogation},
		Canal,
		UserLowerCase
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endChantier
typeCast select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Date Prev Cde},
		{Code projet},
		Projet,
		Type,
		{CP projet},
		{Ville projet},
		NbLogement,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		Famille,
		Produit,
		{Quantité},
		{Prix de base},
		{Prix DO},
		{Prix pro},
		{Prix total},
		{Numéro interne 1},
		Client,
		{Ville client},
		{Type financement},
		{Numéro interne 2},
		{Négoce},
		{Ville négoce},
		{Statut offre},
		Responsable,
		Groupe,
		Offre,
		{Date de maj statut},
		{Numéro avant vente},
		{Créateur offre},
		{Commentaire interne},
		{Offre dérogée},
		{Contrat cadre},
		{Offre nationale},
		{Année Tarif},
		PotentielP1N,
		PotentielP2N,
		PotentielP3N,
		PotentielP4N,
		PotentielP5N,
		PotentielP6N,
		{DateFinValidité},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		CodeATC,
		DEEE,
		OffreSupprimee,
		{Date de création},
		NomSignataire1,
		NomSignataire2,
		DateSignataire1,
		DateSignataire2,
		{DateDérogation},
		Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDiffus
endDiffus, endChantier union(byName: true)~> Union1
canalDiffus sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['STG_OFFRE_DIFFUS.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> stagingDiffus
canalChantier sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['STG_OFFRE_CHANTIER.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> stagingChantier
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix client} as string,
		{Prix négoce} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Typologie projet} as string,
		DateValidite as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['stg_offre.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
